thread.title: Jose Mourinho takes epic dig at Chelsea after Leicester win (Video)
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho takes epic dig at Chelsea after Leicester win (Video)

author: Rebecca Knight
title: Jose Mourinho takes epic dig at Chelsea after Leicester win (Video)
text:
Jose Mourinho takes epic dig at Chelsea after Leicester win (Video) By Rebecca Knight   Sacked 
Jose Mourinho was in a playful mood following his side’s 3-0 win over Leicester City, and despite still sitting in 6th, will be pleased at his side’s performance and their goals. 
United have struggled to finish at times this season, so to see them score three, with Juan Mata and Mkhitaryan getting on the scoresheet – as well as Zlatan (obviously), and playing well to boot must have made the former Chelsea boss smile – and in his post match presser, he made this joke… 'The last time I sat in this chair, I was sacked!' 
— 101 Great Goals (@101greatgoals) February 5, 2017 Top of the league 
Chelsea probably won’t care, given they’re sat at the top of the table, but it was still funny to see the Special One back to his hilarious best, with a gentle dig at his rivals and some soft shade to go with it. 
Mourinho also made sure to chastise the officials, noting that even if Juan Mata should’ve been sent off, his side deserved the break in luck after terrible decisions this season that went against them. Loading tags...
